page.title: 05LIVING IN A TOWER BLOCK
page.content: {Budgies, Gerbils, Mice}and other small animals are permitted because they arekept in cages. When people do their washing they cannot hang it out on the verandah because it makes the tower look ugly. Children cannot play on the verandah in case they lean over the rail and fall, so their mothers must take them downstairs to play. Little children need an adult to take them down in the lift since the lift buttons are out of their reach. When there is a funeral, there is a special cupboard space in the lift to hold a coffin. When there is a wedding, the fire button is used so that the bride can have the sole use of the lift.
